title: getTimeSpansForReservations
name: getTimeSpansForReservations
description: Searches for all resource reservations to resources (devices) within a department. The department is given by the departmentToken parameter. Parameters "from" and "to" indicate the the timespan to search.

Parameter.description: Department token to use.
The API-Key of the user accessing the service.
Java timestamp to indicate the start date from which to search for resevations.
Java timestamp to indicate the end date to search for resevations.

Success 200.description: JSON Objects with all timespans currently registered for reservations.

title: getTimeSpansForUser
name: getTimeSpansForUser
description: Searches for all Timespan entries for the user with the given apiKey. This includes resource reservations initiated by this user, illness and vacation entries.

Parameter.description: The API-Key of the user accessing the service.

Success 200.description: JSON Objects with all timespans currently registered for the user.

title: getCompany
name: getCompany
description: Returns the company with the given id.

Parameter.description: The API-Key of the user accessing the service.

Success 200.description: JSON Object with the company of the given id.

examples.title: Success-Response:
examples.content:
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
	{
   "id" : 1,
   "name" : "Default Company",
   "description" : "",
   "mainAddress" : {
   "id" : 7,
   "zipCode" : "00000",
   "phone" : "00000-00000",
   "fax" : "00000-00000",
   "city" : "City of Admin",
   "street" : "Street of Admins"
   ...many more
 }

title: searchDepartments
name: searchDepartments
description: Searches all departments which contain the given phrase

Parameter.description: The API-Key of the user accessing the service.
The search phrase used in the search.

Success 200.description: JSON department Objects which contained the search phrase.

examples.title: Success-Response:
examples.content:
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
[
  {
    "id" : 6,
    "address" : {
    "id" : 5,
    "zipCode" : "00000",
    "phone" : "00000-00000",
    "fax" : "00000-00000",
    "city" : "City of Admin",
    "street" : "Street of Admins"
    ...many more
   }
]

title: createCounter
name: createCounter
description: creates a counter

Parameter.description: The API-Key of the user accessing the service.
the uuid of the counter to be created.
the name of the counter to be created.
the description of the counter to be created.
the initial value (long) of the counter to be created.

Success 200.description: JSON representation of the counter just created.

examples.title: Success-Response:
examples.content:
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
{
"id": 64,
"counter": {
"id": 63,
"nfcUnit": {
"id": 62,
"uuid": "49ee74df-9c9f-4410-8177-4b33095e939d",
"name": "Counter",
"description": "NFC counter",
"payload": "1",
"payloadSize": 1,
"lastConnectedTime": 1588453253120,
"latitude": null,
"longitude": null,
"sequenceNumber": 0,
"unitType": "COUNTER",
"lastConnectedDevice": null,
"wrappedResource": null
},
"uuid": "49ee74df-9c9f-4410-8177-4b33095e939d",
"value": 1
	},
"name": "test",
"description": "testcounter",
"department": null
}

title: editCounter
name: editCounter
description: performs an increase, decrease or reset on the given counter

Parameter.description: The API-Key of the user accessing the service.
• on of increase, decrease or reset.
the uuid of the counter to be retrieved.

Success 200.description: JSON representation of the counter just edited.

examples.title: Success-Response:
examples.content:
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
{
"id": 64,
"counter": {
"id": 63,
"nfcUnit": {
"id": 62,
"uuid": "49ee74df-9c9f-4410-8177-4b33095e939d",
"name": "Counter",
"description": "NFC counter",
"payload": "2",
"payloadSize": 1,
"lastConnectedTime": 1588453253120,
"latitude": null,
"longitude": null,
"sequenceNumber": 1,
"unitType": "COUNTER",
"lastConnectedDevice": null,
"wrappedResource": null
},
"uuid": "49ee74df-9c9f-4410-8177-4b33095e939d",
"value": 2
	},
"name": "test",
"description": "testcounter",
"department": null
}

title: getDepartment
name: getDepartment
description: Returns the department with the given id.

Parameter.description: The API-Key of the user accessing the service.

Success 200.description: JSON Object with the department of the given id.

title: deleteDocument
name: deleteDocument
description: Deletes a document

Parameter.description: The API-Key of the user accessing the service.
The id of the document to remove.
department token of the department the document belongs to.

title: getDocumentById
name: getDocumentById
description: returns the document with the given id

Parameter.description: The API-Key of the user accessing the service.

title: getDocumentContent
name: getDocumentContent
description: returns the content of the document with the given id

Parameter.description: The API-Key of the user accessing the service.

title: getDocumentGroups
name: getDocumentGroups
description: gets all document groups (metadata only) within the given department

Parameter.description: The API-Key of the user accessing the service.
The department token of the department.

Success 200.description: JSON DocumentInfo-Objects with information about found documents.

title: getDocuments
name: getDocuments
description: gets all documents (metadata only) within the given department and document group.

Parameter.description: The API-Key of the user accessing the service.
The department token of the department.
The document group name within this department to look for documents.

Success 200.description: JSON DocumentInfo-Objects with information about found documents.

title: searchDocuments
name: searchDocuments
description: Returns all the documents in the given department and document group matching the search phrase.

Parameter.description: The API-Key of the user accessing the service.
The department token of the department.
The searchstring to searh for.

Success 200.description: JSON DocumentInfo-Objects with information about found documents.

title: setDocumentAttributes
name: setDocumentAttributes
description: Changes different attributes of a document

Parameter.description: The API-Key of the user accessing the service.
The new name of the document.
The new MIME-Type of the document.
The new document tag.
description of changes made.

title: getInboxMessages
name: getInboxMessages
description: Returns all the messages received for the current user or the user specified by param from.

Parameter.description: The API-Key of the user accessing the service.
The user which inbox to read - if specified

title: getMessageById
name: getMessageById
description: Returns the message with the given id.

Parameter.description: The API-Key of the user accessing the service.
The id of the message content to read.

title: getSentMessages
name: getSentMessages
description: Returns all the messages sent by the current user or the user specified by param from.

Parameter.description: The API-Key of the user accessing the service.
The user which outbox to read - if specified

title: newMessage
name: newMessage
description: sends a new message to an inbox.

Parameter.description: The API-Key of the user accessing the service.
the recipiants username.
the subject of the message.
the message to send.

examples.title: Success-Response:

title: removeMessage
name: removeMessage
description: deletes the message with the given id.

Parameter.description: The API-Key of the user accessing the service.
the id of the message to be deleted.

examples.title: Success-Response:

title: assignTask
name: assignTask
description: Assignes a task, sets it's status and percentage complete

Parameter.description: The API-Key of the user accessing the service.
The state of the task (ASSIGNED / CREATED / FINISHED...)
The id of the user the task should be assigned to.
The percentage complete value for the task.

title: getProjectTasks
name: getProjectTasks
description: Returns all tasks for the project with the given id

Parameter.description: The API-Key of the user accessing the service.
ID of the project to retrieve the tasks from.

title: getProjects
name: getProjects
description: Returns all projects the current user is project lead

Parameter.description: The API-Key of the user accessing the service.

examples.title: Success-Response:

title: createResource
name: createResource
description: creates a new resource

Parameter.description: The API-Key of the user accessing the service.
The department token of the department.
The resource group to put new resource in.
• uuid of new resource
• name of new resource
• description
• max.number of slots for new device
• ip address of new device/resource (if applicable)
• list of commands the device understands
• is device an agent?

title: deleteResourceById
name: deleteResourceById
description: Deletes a resource by id

Parameter.description: The API-Key of the user accessing the service.
The id of the resource to remove.
department token of the department the resource belongs to.

title: deleteResourceByUuid
name: deleteResourceByUuid
description: Deletes a resource by uuid

Parameter.description: The API-Key of the user accessing the service.
The uuid of the resource to remove.
department token of the department the resource belongs to.

title: getResourceById
name: getResourceById
description: returns the resource/device with the given id

Parameter.description: The API-Key of the user accessing the service.

name: getResourceByUuid
description: Searches for a resource with the given uuid.

Parameter.description: The API-Key of the user accessing the service.

title: getResourceGroups
name: getResourceGroups
description: gets all resource groups within the given department.

Parameter.description: The API-Key of the user accessing the service.
The department token of the department.

Success 200.description: of {ResourceGroup} objects with information about found resource groups.

title: getResources
name: getResources
description: gets all resources within the given department and group.

Parameter.description: The API-Key of the user accessing the service.
The department token of the department.
The resource group of the resources.

name: isResourceOnline
description: returns if the resource with the given uuid is online.

Parameter.description: The API-Key of the user accessing the service.

name: isResourceOnlineById
description: returns if the resource with the given id is online.

Parameter.description: The API-Key of the user accessing the service.

name: searchResources
description: Searches the given department for resources with phrase.

Parameter.description: The API-Key of the user accessing the service.
The department token of the department.

title: sendCommand
name: sendCommand
description: sends a command to a resource

Parameter.description: The API-Key of the user accessing the service.
The department token of the department.
The resource group of the device.
The uuid of the resource.
• the command to send
• the value sent with the command

name: setResourceAttributesByUuid
description: Changes different attributes of a resource

Parameter.description: The API-Key of the user accessing the service.
The new name of the resource. omit if no changes.
The new description of the resource. omit if no changes.
(true/false) - Set the resources online state. omit if no changes.
update command set the resource understands. separate by colon (e.G ON:OFF:RESET)
new coordinates of the resource (LAT:LONG)- leave blank if no changes
set a specific resource attribute to a specific value (e.G. NAME:WERT)

title: updateResource
name: updateResource
description: Changes different attributes of a resource

Parameter.description: The API-Key of the user accessing the service.
The new name of the resource. omit if no changes.
The new description of the resource. omit if no changes.
(true/false) - Set the resources online state. omit if no changes.
update command set the resource understands. separate by colon (e.G ON:OFF:RESET)
new coordinates of the resource (LAT:LONG)- leave blank if no changes
set a specific resource attribute to a specific value (e.G. NAME:WERT)

The uuid of the timetracker to start or stop (toggle).
